name: Maybe Drinking. Russian Style
description: In this game you'll have to help your hero with getting completely drunk in the various places of such a grand country like Russia. But don't think that everything gonna be easy - you'll face lots of different obstacles which you'll have to avoid to find the True Harmony.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 150 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 60 MB available space
